name: Tomcat Web Sessions
shortDescription: Seamless failover for Apache Tomcat web sessions.
longDescription: Hazelcast Tomcat Session Manager is a container-specific module that enables session replication for Tomcat web applications without requiring changes to the application. Features: - Tomcat 7, 8, 8.5 & 9 support - Support for sticky and non-sticky sessions. - Deferred write for performance boost. - Embedded or remote Hazelcast setups See also the step-by-step Tomcat Session Replication Guide for Spring Boot applications
